    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public org.forgerock.http.protocol.Response handle​(org.forgerock.http.protocol.Request request)
        Handle the request for the OpenAM REST API docs. This will make an internal call to the CREST API endpoint to retrieve the API description and use that to generate the docs in HTML.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The Response containing the OpenAM REST API docs as HTML.
